# this is the build file for project rara
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(rara VERSION 0.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "C:/PROGRA~1/MIB055~1/2022/COMMUN~1/VC/Tools/Llvm/x64/bin/clang-cl.exe")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "C:/PROGRA~1/MIB055~1/2022/COMMUN~1/VC/Tools/Llvm/x64/bin/clang-cl.exe")
add_executable(rara "")
set_target_properties(rara PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "rara")
set_target_properties(rara PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(rara PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(rara INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(rara PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include
)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_FRONTEND_VARIANT STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET rara PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(rara PRIVATE
    spdlog
    fmt
)
target_link_directories(rara PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/lib
)
target_sources(rara PRIVATE
    src/lexer.cpp
    src/logger.cpp
    src/utility.cpp
    src/tokenizer/fsm_tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/regex_tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/token_factory.cpp
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "C:/PROGRA~1/MIB055~1/2022/COMMUN~1/VC/Tools/Llvm/x64/bin/clang-cl.exe")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "C:/PROGRA~1/MIB055~1/2022/COMMUN~1/VC/Tools/Llvm/x64/bin/clang-cl.exe")
add_executable(rara-test "")
set_target_properties(rara-test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "rara-test")
set_target_properties(rara-test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(rara-test PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(rara-test INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(rara-test PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/include
)
target_compile_definitions(rara-test PRIVATE
    ENV_TEST
)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_FRONTEND_VARIANT STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(rara-test PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET rara-test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(rara-test PRIVATE
    spdlog
    fmt
)
target_link_directories(rara-test PRIVATE
    C:/dev/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows-static/lib
)
target_sources(rara-test PRIVATE
    src/lexer.cpp
    src/logger.cpp
    src/utility.cpp
    src/tokenizer/fsm_tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/regex_tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/tokenizer.cpp
    src/tokenizer/token_factory.cpp
    tests/test.cpp
    tests/tokenizer.cpp
)
